title: Signal Forest
subtitle: Story 01
body: Luna and Pip tiptoe into the Signal Forest, where tiny lights blink like fireflies. Each light is a message from a friend. Luna waves her lantern, and the forest twinkles back in a happy hello.
prompt: A bright, cheerful forest at dusk with colorful glowing fireflies, soft pastel sky, friendly whimsical mood, smooth camera glide, high detail, kid-friendly.

title: Rainbow Station
subtitle: Story 02
body: At Rainbow Station, the train is made of shining balloons. Pip turns a big candy dial, and the station lights up in pinks and blues. The doors open with a giggle.
prompt: A vibrant, playful train station with balloon-like trains, candy colors, glowing lights, joyful atmosphere, cinematic but cute, slow push-in.

title: Mirror Basin
subtitle: Story 03
body: In the Mirror Basin, the water is a smooth rainbow. Luna drops a tiny pebble, and the ripples become floating stars. Pip makes a wish for new adventures.
prompt: A colorful magical pond with rainbow water, floating star lights, pastel aurora, gentle ripples, whimsical and bright, slow lateral pan.

title: Luna
subtitle: Character
body: Luna is a brave little explorer with a glowing lantern. She loves making new friends and listens closely to every tiny signal in the world.
prompt: A single cute girl character named Luna standing with a glowing lantern, bright colors, clean background, friendly smile, kid-friendly 3D cartoon style.

title: Cloud Bridge
subtitle: Story 05
body: They cross the Cloud Bridge made of soft marshmallow mist. Every step makes a tiny rainbow puff. A golden kite guides them toward the next secret.
prompt: A bright sky bridge made of fluffy clouds and pastel mist, rainbow puffs with each step, whimsical and happy, gentle camera drift.

title: Pip
subtitle: Character
body: Pip is a playful little robot with a big heart. He loves buttons, sparkles, and cheering his friends with a thumbs-up.
prompt: A single cute robot character named Pip with round friendly eyes, bright colors, clean background, kid-friendly 3D cartoon style.
